title: 8-Week Marriage
description:
A cord left wrapped in a dead man’s hands. He was killed with it, by his wife. Justified or homicide? Secrets uncovered will help decide where the truth really lies.

For episode information and photos, please visit https://anatomyofmurder.com/
author: content@audiochuck.com (audiochuck)
